about_the_game:
Dear Spiral Explorers,

Thank you for your continued support and for playing Idle Spiral. Over the past few months, our development team has grown significantly, allowing us to bring you updates at an incredible pace. To maintain this rapid cadence of fresh content, we need your support more than ever. That's why we're excited to offer this special DLC pack.

We have an ambitious vision to make Idle Spiral an unimaginably vast experience, and with your backing, we can make that dream a reality. Join us on this journey as we spiral into new realms of idle gameplay!

By purchasing this DLC, you'll gain the ability to customize the shape of your spiral in Battle Spiral. Experiment with the n and d variables to craft your own unique, personalized spiraling pattern! Express your individuality and let your true spiral nature shine.

Note: This is a support/cosmetics DLC and does not provide any gameplay advantages. Its purpose is to fund ongoing development while adding a creative flair to your adventure.

Thank you for being a part of the Idle Spiral community. Together, we'll watch this game unfurl to incredible heights!
